column3: 2015) send sympathy card margaret ellen wrightsel
column5: died tuesday evening at adena regional medical center following a brief illness. she was the widow of charles richard ""dick"" wrightsel. arrangements are being completed at this time. print back express your condolences contact us get mobile version privacy terms of use 2010 - 2015 haller funeral home funeral home website by batesville
